org.objectweb.celtix
Interface BusEventFilter

public interface BusEventFilter

Interface to be implemented by any class acting as a bus event filter. It allows a registered bus listener to filter the events of interest.

Method Summary
 boolean isEventEnabled(BusEvent e)
          Invoked before sending the specified event to the listener.
 

Method Detail

isEventEnabled

boolean isEventEnabled(BusEvent e)
Invoked before sending the specified event to the listener.

Parameters:
e - The bus event to be sent
Returns:
boolean If true, the event is to be sent to the listener, otherwise false.
